statements: DELETE FROM election_debates_schedule WHERE moderator_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM election_debates_schedule WHERE moderator_name = 'Anderson' AND debate_date < '2023-01-01'
DELETE FROM participants WHERE participant_role = 'Opponent' AND debate_id IN (SELECT debate_id FROM debates WHERE moderator = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM participants WHERE participant_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM debate_participants WHERE participant_id = 3 AND debate_id = 2;
DELETE FROM debate_attendance WHERE attendance_status = true;
DELETE FROM debate_attendance WHERE debate_id = 1 AND participant_id = 2;
